ai.summary: A gentle 3.4 km loop along the Inisherk Trail near Crom in the UK, suitable for walkers seeking a light, easy outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained grassy paths with occasional compact gravel, gentle rises, and light mud after rain; some sections may be exposed.
ai.safety_notes: Conditions can change; wear sturdy shoes and stay on marked paths. Check the weather before you go, bring navigation tools, and watch for mud after rain. Keep an eye on children near any water features and be prepared for exposed sections in strong winds.
recommended_gear: Map and compass or GPS device
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn are ideal for best weather and scenery; route is hikeable year-round with proper gear.

seo.title: Inisherk Trail, Crom – Easy 3.4 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the easy 3.4 km Inisherk Trail near Crom, UK. A family-friendly hike with gentle terrain, practical safety tips, and essential gear.
